subject: National Westminster Bank pl
body:
National Westminster Bank plc, London.
(Natwest Bank U.k )
135 Bishopsgate, London EC2M 3UR
International  Remittance Dep’t,
London (U.k).
Tel: +44 77 00 309 274.
Tel: +44 77 00 309 043..
Official Email;  
natwestoliverplcinf@accountant.com
Private Email:  
plcnatwestbank9@gmail.com
Date: 05th  of  June  2018.
Attn:  Dear:   
We the NatWest Bank Plc Of London has received your  option .
After the confirmation order from the United Nations regarding your fund  of $10.5million United state dollar. The application for  the  option  you selected. 
The approval of your fund released has been issued to our bank for immediate released of your fund to any method you decided to received your fund.
The approval order has been given today being the 05th of June 2018.
We are hereby to inform you that you should  read the following procedures.
1, Due to our new banking rules and regulations.  Any amount of Money above $1million , the customer in person must open an account with our bank which will cost him/her the total cost of  £980.00 GBP, in total.
This is the only amount needed to enable us open  the account on your name and to complete the transfer process without any delay:
Second option: An Approval has been issued to obtain an atm card on your name as the beneficiary of the total fund,  and we will deposit the whole money into the Atm card on your name and send it to  any of your post address.
Third option: An Approval was issued as well, to issue a certified Bank Draft on your name,  and the Draft will be post to you as well, which will allowed you to deposit it with your bank for immediate payment.
Finally, before we can proceed to complete the transfer process , you have to  first of all open an account with our bank to recognized you in our banking data system.  that will help us to complete your transfer to any of you given option you have selected. 
Reply as soon as possible by requesting the details to send the £980.00 GBP. 
You have 3 working days to reply , otherwise, the application for your payment will be cancelled by our bank.
If you dear have any question or suggestion , do not hesitate to ask.
Awaiting for your Urgent responds?
Kind Regards
Mr. Oliver Jerrome,
Head Corporate Banking Transactional Products & Services Manager.
Tel: +44 77 00 309 274
Tel: +44 77 00 309 043. 
DISCLAIMER
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This message and any attachment contained here is confidential and  proprietary to FNB™. Contents may be privileged or otherwise protected by law. The information is solely intended for the individual or the entity it is addressed to. If you are not the intended recipient of this message, you are not authorized to read, forward, print, retain, copy or disseminate this message or any part of it. If you have received this e-mail in error, please notify the sender immediately by return e-mail and delete it from your computer

subject: Re:   National Westminster Bank pl
body:
Hello Mr. Oliver Jerrome,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's quite interesting to learn about the new banking rules and procedures.

I'm a bit confused about the process though. Could you please elaborate more on why I need to open an account with your bank? Also, could you explain how this will help in completing the transfer?

Furthermore, I would like to know more about the GBP cost mentioned in your email. What does it cover exactly?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jessica
